0.name: NOBODY
0.subtitle: Imaginary Pursuits
0.bio: You have no girlfriend. Nobody wants you. Try harder. Check back later.

1.name: TIFFANY C.
1.subtitle: Computer Science - Incoming @ Google
1.bio: From growing up in the Bay Area to publishing her research at 18, she's worked harder than anyone she knows to succeed.
1.tooltip: Tiffany is extremely intelligent. Flattery will only get you so far with her. You need to prove you're smart enough to be worth her time.

2.name: EZRA M.
2.subtitle: Philosophy & History - Double Major
2.bio: A fun-loving and whimsical free spirit, he won't let anything—or anyone—drag him and his vibe down.
2.tooltip: Ezra is turned off by the rat race. He sees things more holistically than you do, and isn't really swayed by how many hackathons you win.

3.name: JENNY T.
3.subtitle: Economics - Treasurer, αΚΔΦ
3.bio: The youngest E-Board member in her chapter's history, she's well aware of the leverage her well-known status provides.
3.tooltip: Beneath Jenny's friendly demeanor is a cautious, calculating mind. You need to stick out from the other antisocial losers she meets.

9.name: NOBODY
9.subtitle: You and the Void
9.bio:
You had your shot. You blew it. You pray they'll come back.
They won't.

1.name: TARA
1.desc: A steadfast and reserved friend from a time long gone.
1.tooltip: One of the only friends from high school you retain. She cares deeply about your mental health and wellbeing, and enjoys life.

2.name: NASH
2.desc: The only thing bigger than his brain is his ego.
2.tooltip: You met Nash at a party in August. The only thing he has on his mind is getting rich. To his credit, he's been working like a dog.

1.name: CHEN
1.desc: Quiet, reserved, whip-smart. Won't do you any favors socially.
1.tooltip: You met Chen online, and from day one you could tell his main priority would be studying. That's probably how you'll get close.

2.name: KEVIN
2.desc: A narc's wet dream. Good luck trying to study.
2.tooltip: You met Kevin when he was begging for help on the first week of classes. Even then, he was high as a kite. Now you're stuck with him.
